my_job::clip_card_0::goals[0]: Choose a worker to profile, start by showing the place where they work.
my_job::text_card_1::text: Now it's time to interview your character. Make sure you move some place quiet.
my_job::text_card_3::text: When you're finished shooting, you can arrange your clips below, by pressing the 'Order' button. You can trim individual clips, by tapping their thumbnail image.
my_job::clip_card_4::goals[0]: Record the character interacting with one or more other people on the job.
my_job::clip_card_6::goals[0]: Get close. Ask- What is your favorite part of your job?
my_job::clip_card_1::goals[0]: Show the character in action, doing their primary job.
my_job::clip_card_5::goals[0]: Ask- How did you come to do this job?
my_job::clip_card_7::goals[0]: Ask- What might surprise most people about your job?
my_job::clip_card_7::goals[1]: Ask- What is something interesting about your job that might surprise most people?
my_job::clip_card_2::goals[0]: Get close. Record a significant detail of your character's job.
my_job::intro_card_0::headline: What's your Job?
my_job::title: What's your Job?
my_job::text_card_0::text: Take additional shots if needed. When you have are happy you have captured the main activities involved in your character's job, continue.
my_job::text_card_2::text: You can repeat this process with different workers and find the contrast between them.
my_job::clip_card_3::goals[0]: Record the character's expression while working.
